document_data.name: Turvuld's Swords
document_data.symbol: Two crossed [[silver]] [[saber]]s and a vertical silver [[spear]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Turvuld's Swords''' was a reserved mercenary company from [[Murghôm]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization:
Turvuld's Swords, like all other mercenary companies of Murghôm, was established by the country's military veterans who were forced into hired work by the army shrinkage decreed by the [[Princes of Murghôm]] over several decades. All companies, Turvuld's Swords included, were not bigger than 40 ex-military members in the full employment of the organization.

The company's insignia was the image of two crossed [[silver]] [[sable]]s on a dun-brown background. Both were depicted with sharp edges up, the weapon on the right laid atop the left blade. Between the two stood a silver [[spear]] pointing up.
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}}century DR, Turvuld's Swords became well-known for being conservative professionals, stern and silent mercenaries who valued low risk and attention to detail.
